name: White Tassel
title: Ardent Argent: White Tassel
desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">The character deals +1 DMG.(<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
